track.name: Sparks
comments: So relaxing in that moments of stress : )
My favorite song by them.  This is love.

When I saw Wedding Crashers at the theatre in 2005, I started crying uncontrollably when this came on.  I'm not afraid to admit it.  The connotations are completely wrong for the scene but it still had an affect nonetheless.   I had just broke up with a girl I had been dating for 3 years.  Vulnerability blows.

do you know what plagiarism means? because, if you check facts, which would take but a minute's consultation with google, joe's waltz came into being long after sparks was writ and released. seriously people, sometimes you don't even try.

http://www.last.fm/music/The+Dodos/_/Joe%27s+Waltz

Coldplay is definitely into plagiarism, but why do they get away with it?
"did I drive you away? i know what you'll say, You'll say, Oh, sing one we know..."  Brilliant.
Love Chris's vocals on this beaut!
Always plays when I need it the most!
(¿Por qué tuve que dedicarla?) Makes me cry :(
"My heart is yours: it's you that I hold on to" Beautiful
I can't help it, this song brings me to tears.
best for listening alone at night [4]
i love this song so much,just beautiful
Favorite Coldplay song. Leaves me in a feeling of "ugh", if that makes sense. lol
